body.name: Rimensy Hybrid Queen Mattress, 14 Inch in a Box, Gel Memory Foam, Individually Wrapped Pocket Coils Innerspring, Support & Pressure Relief, Medium Firm Feel, 60"*80"*14"
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 39 mins
features: SLEEP SOUNDLY - Rimensy 14 inch queen size mattress combines the innerspring wrapped coils with the cooling gel memory foam for an optimal sleep experience. The pressure-relieving foam cradles your body shape so you awake free of aches and pains and fresh as a daisy.
COOL TO SLEEP ON - The cooling gel particles, air-flow between coils and the hypoallergenic fabrics maintain a comfortable climate all night, making this twin bed more breathable.
ISOLATED MOTION - The individually pocketed coils provide enough support for proper spinal alignment and absorb motion disturbance between partners, allowing your deep sleep not to be disturded.

QUEEN SIZE BED IN A BOX - Measures 60" W x 80" D x 14" H and supports a maximum weight of 700 lbs. It is compatible with most twin bed frames, such as box spring, floor, slatted base, flat platform or adjustable bed, hospital bed.

WORRY-FREE - This medium firm mattresses come with a 10-year warranty. We recommend 72 hours for your new mattress to return to its full shape. Keep enough distance to the mattress when unwrappeing，as it may have a risk to smack people when expanding.For assistance with any problems you may have, please contact our customer support team.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleasantly surprised!
reviews.reviewText: Took a chance buying a bed in a box. I spent a lot of time looking here and other places, reading reviews.The reality is that store brand mattresses just cost a fortune for anything remotely quality or comfortable, especialy king size. The mattress is heavy! Took two of us to get it in the house and unrolled. I let us expand for several days before sleeping on it. The corners took a little longer but we were using this bed within a couple of days. We have had it now for a couple of months and I feel like it's even more comfortable as it's broken in. It is more firm than I expected however we had prior been sleeping on a very worn well-known brand mattress that honestly was causing us so much back pain, hip pain and discomfort, I am relieved we gave this a try. We should have been sleeping on a more firm bed I have realized. My hips are no longer hurting. I have been waking up feeling rested for the first time in a long time! I love the memory foam plus individually wrapped coils. With two of us (and often two dogs) in the bed, the mattress is holding up well. We are both over 200# and have two large dogs. We might try adding a 1-2" foam topper but honestly the mattress is really comfy as is. The edges are not as firm as store bought mattresses and you will sink down a bit if sitting on the edge of the bed but it's not been a problem. We don't feel as if we will roll off. There is also really NO problematic movement in the bed if one person rolls over or shifts, it does not disturb the other person! I don't know how well this bed will hold up over time but it has a 10 year warranty. It seems very well made, it is comfortable and I imagine we will get at least a few years out of it. So at this price, it is very well worth it. We are pleasantly surprised!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rimensy Full Mattress: Speedy Delivery, Supreme Comfort, and Unmatched Support
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Rimensy Full Mattress, and I am extremely pleased with my experience. The speedy delivery was impressive, with the mattress arriving within just 4 days of placing the order. The convenience of a mattress in a box made the process hassle-free.The 10-inch hybrid design, combining gel memory foam and individually wrapped pocket coils innerspring, provides an optimal blend of support and pressure relief. The medium-firm feel strikes a perfect balance, making it ideal for my son's full-size bed. The quality of materials used is evident, and the mattress has proven to be both comfortable and durable.Overall, I highly recommend the Rimensy Full Mattress for anyone seeking a reliable and comfortable sleep solution. The swift delivery, coupled with the mattress's excellent features, has made this purchase a truly satisfying experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars for my 5yr old
reviews.reviewText: nice bed for a kid. It's really very soft for an adult as when I sit on it or put my knee on it, I can feel like I'm almost sinking to the bottom of the springs. But when you lay down on it, it's really comfortable and it conforms to your body weight. Too soft for me (and I like plush beds) but for great for a lighter weight individual. My son loves it and that's what matters the most. It inflated very quickly and didn't even need to wait 72 hours since it was fully decompressed within a couple of hours and my 5 year old only weight like 40lbs so I didn't it would affect it much anyways. So far so good, hopefully it holds up as I'm planning on this being my son's bed until he's at least in high school.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rimensy King Mattress: Where Comfort Meets Movie-Day Bliss
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded to the Rimensy King Mattress, and let me tell you, it's been a total game-changer for our sleep routine. This 14-inch hybrid marvel, packed with gel foam and individually wrapped pocket coils, brings a whole new level of comfort.**Sleep Quality Upgrade:**Since switching to the Rimensy mattress, my sleep quality has skyrocketed. Falling asleep faster and staying in dreamland longer has become the norm, making every night a rejuvenating experience.**Sunday Cuddle Extravaganza:**Here's a delightful bonus – my wife and I have turned Sundays into our ultimate cuddle and movie day. The comfort of this mattress adds a touch of luxury to our lazy weekends, creating a cozy cocoon where we can relax and unwind together.**Unmatched Comfort:**Hands down, this is one of the most comfortable beds we've ever slept on. The medium-firm feel strikes the perfect balance between support and plushness. It's like sinking into a cloud without sacrificing the necessary support for a restful night's sleep.**Easy Unboxing Experience:**Getting this mattress was a breeze – it comes in a convenient box, and the setup was surprisingly simple. Unbox, unroll, and voilà – you've got yourself a ticket to a better night's sleep.**Conclusion:**In a nutshell, the Rimensy King Mattress is a dream come true for anyone seeking improved sleep quality and unparalleled comfort. From lazy Sundays filled with cuddles to the simple joy of falling asleep faster, this mattress delivers on its promise. It's more than a bed; it's an investment in blissful nights and cozy weekends. Sweet dreams await! 🌙✨
